project1.title: Chatty App
project1.description: The chatty app is a messaging app I contributed to for a group project at NSS. It allows a user to select who is sending a message, submit a new message, and perform specific actions such as liking and disliking messages, deleting messages, and selecting app styles.
project1.technologiesUsed: HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, Sass, JavaScript, jQuery

project2.title: Pinterest Clone
project2.description: I built this Pinterest clone for an NSS class assignment in order to practice making Axios API calls to Firebase. Users first login using their Google accounts and then can create, delete, and update boards with individual pins related to their interests.
project2.technologiesUsed: HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, Sass, JavaScript, jQuery, Axios, Firebase

project3.title: Tamagotchi
project3.description: Modelled after the 90's Toy, the Tamagotchi project was a NSS class assignment to practice modular development and styling using Sass. Users can alter the scores calculating when clicking buttons in each displayed quadrant.

project4.title: Spotify2
project4.technologiesUsed: HTML, CSS, Vanilla JavaScript, Version Control with Github

project5.title: Spotify3
project5.technologiesUsed: HTML, CSS, Vanilla JavaScript, Version Control with Github
